title: [Firefly Villa, Garden]
description: Glaesine orbs speckle the verdant growth, their smooth surfaces reflecting the sunlight into a myriad of bright colors upon the dark green lawn and seashell pathways of the garden.  Twin benches, each fashioned of golden linden, are crafted into half-moon shapes and set within the rose-laden bushes.

Glowing softly, glaesine orbs speckle the verdant growth and illuminate the cultured lawn and seashell pathways of the garden.  Twin benches, each fashioned of golden linden, are crafted into half-moon shapes and set within the rose-laden bushes.
